Back to Islamic Law Bibliography

This bibliography covers English-language books and articles within books that discuss Islamic law. The titles were published between 2003 and 2008 and are held in the Library of Congress. The listing is divided into three sections: works on Islamic law in general, works on the history of Islamic law, and works devoted to a specific area of law.

Also see the 2009-2014 bibliography for more recent works.
